name: Krossroads Integrative Health and Recovery Solutions INC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Krossroads Integrative Health and Recovery Solutions INC is a Case Manager/Care Coordinator provider based in Albuquerque, NM. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $16.7M in Medicaid payments across 86K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $16.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
